pengusecurity.encrypt

Class PenguEncryptedMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • pengusecurity.encrypt.PenguEncryptedMessage

  • public class PenguEncryptedMessage
extends java.lang.Object
    This class combines the AES encryption and RSA encryption classes to encrypt and decrypt messages of varying sizes. This class creates and breaks apart "encrypted message Strings".
    See Also:
    PenguAESEncryption, PenguKeyPair

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String DELIMITER
      Stores the delimiter constant, that is used to separate a RSA public key hash, a RSA encrypted AES key, and a AES encrypted Message.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PenguEncryptedMessage()
      Default constructor method.
      PenguEncryptedMessage(java.lang.String encryptedMessage)
      Parameterized constructor method that receives an encrypted message string.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String extractPublicKeyHash()
      A method to retrieve the extracted public key hash.
      java.lang.String getDecryptedString(java.lang.String privateKey)
      Extracts the encrypted message portion of an encrypted message String, and decrypts it using an inputed Base64 encoded private key String.
      java.lang.String getEncryptedString(java.lang.String publicKey, java.lang.String unencryptedMessage)
      Creates an encrypted message String using an inputed public key and a message.
      static java.lang.String getSHA1Hash(java.lang.String input)
      Creates a SHA1Hash that is encoded in hexadecimal form.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • DELIMITER

        public static final java.lang.String DELIMITER
        Stores the delimiter constant, that is used to separate a RSA public key hash, a RSA encrypted AES key, and a AES encrypted Message. Format: SOME_RSA_PUBLIC_KEY_HASH#SOME_RSA_ENCRYPTED_AES_KEY#SOME_AES_ENCRYPTED_MESSAGE
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • PenguEncryptedMessage

        public PenguEncryptedMessage()
        Default constructor method.

      • PenguEncryptedMessage

        public PenguEncryptedMessage(java.lang.String encryptedMessage)
        Parameterized constructor method that receives an encrypted message string.
        Parameters:
        encryptedMessage - The encrypted message String. Format: SOME_RSA_PUBLIC_KEY_HASH#SOME_RSA_ENCRYPTED_AES_KEY#SOME_AES_ENCRYPTED_MESSAGE.

    • Method Detail

      • getSHA1Hash

        public static java.lang.String getSHA1Hash(java.lang.String input)
        Creates a SHA1Hash that is encoded in hexadecimal form.
        Parameters:
        input - The input String to be hashed.
        Returns:
        Returns a SHA1 hexadecimal hashed String.

      • getEncryptedString

        public java.lang.String getEncryptedString(java.lang.String publicKey,
                                           java.lang.String unencryptedMessage)
        Creates an encrypted message String using an inputed public key and a message.
        Parameters:
        publicKey - The Base64 encoded public key string to be used for encrypting the AES key.
        unencryptedMessage - The message String.
        Returns:
        Returns an encrypted message String. Format: SOME_RSA_PUBLIC_KEY_HASH#SOME_RSA_ENCRYPTED_AES_KEY#SOME_AES_ENCRYPTED_MESSAGE.

      • getDecryptedString

        public java.lang.String getDecryptedString(java.lang.String privateKey)
        Extracts the encrypted message portion of an encrypted message String, and decrypts it using an inputed Base64 encoded private key String.
        Parameters:
        privateKey - The Base64 encoded private key String.
        Returns:
        Returns a decrypted message String.

      • extractPublicKeyHash

        public java.lang.String extractPublicKeyHash()
        A method to retrieve the extracted public key hash.
        Returns:
        Returns a String with the value of the publicKeyHash field.
